page.title: 01ARBROATH.
page.content: Our D.Block ia mainly very good farm land, growing mostly cereals,like barley and wheat. Also grown are potatoes, oil seed rape, rasberries, rhubarb and hay. We also have two and a half square kilometres of the North sea,and around three square kilometres of the main town of Arbroath. In the town patch, we have one of the most famous abbeys in Scotland, where the Declaration of Scottish Independance was signed in 1320.Thousands of tourists come to Arbroath to see the Abbey as well as enjoying a delightful clifftop walk along one of the Nature Trails. Our patch also contains, a new Health Centre, a recently modernised library,a garden centre, four schools, and a variety of council houses.
